bibl.title: Letter from Rupert Blue to Henry Rose Carter, February 27, 1915

div1.p: Blue requests that Carter review a proposed law on mosquito control.

div1.head: Letter from Rupert Blue to Henry Rose Carter, February 27, 1915
div1.opener:
J.R.S.
OFFICE OF THE SURGEON GENERAL
IN REPLYING
ADDRESS THE SURGEON GENERAL
U. S. PUBLIC HEALTH SERVICE
TREASURY DEPARTMENT
BUREAU OF
THE PUBLIC HEALTH SERVICE
WASHINGTON
February 27, 1915.
Senior Surgeon H. R. Carter,
U. S. Public Health Service,
Marine Hospital,
Baltimore, Md.
Sir:-
div1.p:
There is enclosed herewith a copy of the proposed
ordinance or law relating to “Mosquitoes, Prevention
of Propagation,” which was drafted during the recent
conference at Columbia, S. C.

You are requested to carefully examine this draft
and return the same with such changes as may be deemed
necessary.
div1.closer:
Respectfully, Rupert Blue
Surgeon-General. JR
Inc.
